column6: CRIME AND PUNISHMENT PART 6 The Avengers are caught in the middle as Ghost Rider and the demonically powered vice-president Blackthorne go head-to-flaming-head! What hope does the team have against Satan's soldiers?
column8: | inker:Gerry Alanguilan | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Dave McCaig | writer:Mark Millar | penciller:Leinil Francis Yu
